hero.name: Marcos Cosmoski
hero.title: I turn bold ideas into scalable products through technical leadership and modern architecture.
hero.subtitle: Serverless specialist with an agile mindset, bridging product strategy and engineering for continuous impact.

professional.heading: Professional journey
professional.subheading: From junior developer to serverless technical leadership, every stage highlights impact, context, and growth.

education.heading: Learning & education
education.subheading: Degrees, courses, and certifications that expanded my toolkit alongside hands-on experience.

alfaSoftJunior.title: Junior Software Developer
alfaSoftJunior.summary: First professional role in tech, balancing customer support with the delivery of new web modules.
highlights: Enhanced existing products with PHP, Java, Delphi, and PostgreSQL.
Delivered quick fixes on legacy systems while learning Node.js and JavaScript.
Helped build a new web product from scratch with a small multidisciplinary team.
outcomes: Built a solid foundation across legacy and modern stacks, accelerating future onboarding.

virtualSoftwaresJunior.title: Junior Developer
virtualSoftwaresJunior.summary: Full-stack duties on insurance products, focused on maintenance and incremental enhancements.
highlights: Shipped features using JavaScript, CSS, SQL Server, AngularJS, and Node.js.
Maintained critical modules written in Delphi (Pascal).
Supported deployments and customer success for corporate insurance clients.
outcomes: Established documentation and CI habits that carried into later roles.

virtualSoftwaresPleno.title: Mid-level Developer
virtualSoftwaresPleno.summary: Responsible for evolving services and creating new integrations for partner insurers.
highlights: Designed Node.js and Angular services to replace legacy modules.
Mentored junior developers on best practices and code reviews.
Brought innovation ideas alongside product and business stakeholders.
outcomes: Expanded service offerings while reducing the average delivery time for integrations.

quiverProgramadorSenior.title: Senior Developer
quiverProgramadorSenior.summary: Technical lead in innovation squads, bridging legacy platforms to modern web solutions.
highlights: Led proofs of concept using Node.js, MongoDB, C#, and Angular.
Supported RPA initiatives and automation for internal operations.
Delivered workshops and mentoring for junior engineers.
outcomes: Fostered an experimentation culture that set the stage for modernization later on.

primeNearshore.title: Technical Lead
primeNearshore.summary: Consulting leadership role guiding squads and serverless decisions for Fette Compacting's global ecosystem.
highlights: Designed and evolved serverless architecture using AWS CDK and automated pipelines.
Implemented observability with InfluxDB metrics and proactive monitoring.
Mentored engineers and enforced engineering practices across a distributed team.
outcomes: Reduced incidents and delivered predictable deployments with infrastructure as code.
Shipped critical features for connected industrial machines without downtime.

kwan.title: Software Engineer Consultant
kwan.summary: Digital product consultant at Mindera for the British retailer Dunelm, blending discovery, engineering, and strategy.
highlights: Delivered integrations and automation across the global e-commerce ecosystem.
Supported squads with agile cadence, refining rituals and Jira metrics.
Partnered with business stakeholders to prioritise a customer-centric roadmap.
outcomes: Reduced checkout feature cycle time by 18%.
Provided executive visibility with progress reports and risk tracking.

docatoHead.title: Head of Technology
docatoHead.summary: Led an almost 20 person engineering team with autonomy, agile practices, and technical governance.
highlights: Rolled out end-to-end Scrum with throughput and lead-time metrics.
Created architecture playbooks and shared technical guardrails.
Aligned technology and operations to deliver a business-focused roadmap.
outcomes: Improved release predictability and reduced support bottlenecks.
Team sustained self-management after my offboarding.

docatoTechLead.title: Technical Lead
docatoTechLead.summary: Rebuilt a legacy monolith backend into stable containerised services.
highlights: Migrated workloads to Docker with trustworthy CI/CD pipelines.
Introduced monitoring to remove recurring PM2 crashes.
Spread Node.js, testing, and code review good practices.
outcomes: Drastically reduced downtime with predictable deployments.
Prepared the platform for future legal-tech evolution.

comunidadeCrowd.title: Back-end Developer (Freelance)
comunidadeCrowd.summary: Built the new platform from scratch with authentication, integrations, and instrumentation.
highlights: Modelled database, REST/GraphQL APIs, and payment integrations.
Automated tests and continuous delivery within Docker.
Documented architecture and onboarding for new engineers.
outcomes: Launched the revamped platform with scalability and metrics on day one.

quiverSpecialist.title: Systems Specialist
quiverSpecialist.summary: Assessed critical modules and shaped a modernisation plan for products.
highlights: Diagnosed performance and reliability across legacy stacks.
Introduced DevOps practices and automated testing.
Mapped technical risks with business stakeholders.
outcomes: Modernisation roadmap approved with immediate mitigation actions.

quiverAnalyst.title: Systems Analyst
quiverAnalyst.summary: Full-stack role in insurance products conducting functional and technical analysis.
highlights: Worked with C#, Node.js, AngularJS/2+, Java, and Delphi.
Partnered with support and rollout teams to reduce rework.
Structured functional documentation and B2B integrations.
outcomes: Reduced critical backlog and boosted internal stakeholder satisfaction.

colegioSantana.title: Technical High School in Computer Science
colegioSantana.summary: Hybrid high-school and technical programme covering computing fundamentals and extracurricular projects.
highlights: Active participation in dance and volleyball groups, developing teamwork.
Introduction to programming logic, networking, and databases.
Hands-on projects that sparked an interest in web development.
outcomes: Essential academic base that enabled the transition into a tech career.

posGraduation.title: Postgraduate in Game Design
posGraduation.summary: Specialisation focused on prototyping and interactive experiences.
highlights: Explored mechanics, UX, and storytelling for games.
Built iterative prototypes with commercial engines.
outcomes: Expanded creative toolkit now applied to digital products.

unopar.title: Internet Systems Technology
unopar.summary: Bachelor programme dedicated to web and mobile development.
highlights: Market-driven projects focused on innovation.
Experience with web services, databases, and mobile solutions.
outcomes: Solid full-stack foundations.

certNest.title: NestJS Fundamentals
certNest.summary: Official credential covering modular architecture and best practices with NestJS.
highlights: Dependency injection, pipelines, and testing strategies.
Reusable module structures for scalable services.
outcomes: Formal validation of my modern backend practices.

certHackerRank.title: JavaScript Basic
highlights: Core algorithms, arrays, and string manipulation.
Timed challenges focused on code quality.
outcomes: External confirmation of fundamental JavaScript skills.

certHackerRankIntermediate.title: JavaScript Intermediate
certHackerRankIntermediate.summary: Intermediate exam covering data manipulation, recursion, and algorithm design in JavaScript.
highlights: Solved challenges using maps, sets, and performance-oriented techniques.
Applied functional patterns and clean code practices.
outcomes: Validated the intermediate capabilities used to lead code reviews and mentoring.

certHackerRankNode.title: Node JS Basic
certHackerRankNode.summary: Node.js fundamentals certification focused on modules, IO, and API building.
highlights: Implemented scripts handling asynchronous flows and error management.
Built routes and file processing utilities under timed conditions.
outcomes: Reinforced the Node.js foundations applied daily on serverless projects.

certFullCycleArchitecture.title: Software Architecture Fundamentals
certFullCycleArchitecture.summary: Intensive course on architectural principles, trade-offs, and resilient system design.
highlights: Produced C4 diagrams and evaluated non-functional requirements.
Studied layered, hexagonal, and event-driven architectures through real cases.
outcomes: Strengthened architectural decisions currently used in serverless solutions.

certFullCycleDDD.title: Domain Driven Design
certFullCycleDDD.summary: Immersion into strategic and tactical DDD for microservices.
highlights: Modeled bounded contexts, aggregates, and domain events.
Aligned ubiquitous language between business and engineering.
outcomes: Improved communication and decision-making across product and tech teams.

certFullCycleSolid.title: SOLID Express
certFullCycleSolid.summary: Hands-on reinforcement of SOLID principles and object-oriented design patterns.
highlights: Refactored services applying SRP and dependency inversion.
Wrote automated tests to guarantee regression-free releases.
outcomes: Sharpened code review and mentoring skills for cross-functional squads.

certUdemyUnitTesting.title: Unit Testing for TypeScript & Node.js with Jest
certUdemyUnitTesting.summary: Course focused on Jest, mocks, spies, and TDD best practices.
highlights: Built test suites for Node.js services and external integrations.
Configured CI pipelines to execute automated tests continuously.
outcomes: Increased coverage and confidence in continuous delivery pipelines.

certCebracHardware.title: Hardware & Networks Quick Course
certCebracHardware.summary: Hands-on training in computer assembly, maintenance, and networking fundamentals.
highlights: Diagnosed hardware failures and configured local networks.
Learned cabling, IP addressing, and essential services.
outcomes: Provided early technical background that complements academic studies.

certExercitoOficial.title: Reserve Officer Training
certExercitoOficial.summary: Military program focused on leadership, discipline, and decision-making under pressure.
highlights: Coordinated platoon operations and strategic planning.
Developed resilience, communication, and rapid response skills.
outcomes: Experience that shaped leadership skills applied today in engineering teams.

portfolio.heading: Featured portfolio
portfolio.description: Live products that are continuously evolving.

vestouro.title: Vestouro – Month by Month
vestouro.summary: Chrome extension for financial planning with the “Enjoy Envelope” method, expense control, debt tracking, and investments.

footer.note: Open to conversations about technical leadership, serverless architecture, and building digital products.
footer.rights: © {{year}} Marcos Cosmoski. Built with React, Redux Toolkit, and Tailwind.
